gurmukhi: Kuly K`g KUnI mhwN bIr KyqM ]ncy bIr bYqwlXM BUq pRyqM ]
transliteration: Khule Khagg Khoonoo Mahaan Boor Khetan|| Nache Boor Baitaalayan Bhoot Pretan||
translation: The brave warriors are moving in the battlefield with naked swords, smeared with blood; evil spirits, ghosts, fiends and goblins are dancing.

gurmukhi: bjy fMk faurU auTy nwd sMKM ]mno m`l ju`ty mhwN h`Q bMKM ]49]
transliteration: Bade Dank Dauroo Outhe Naad Sankhan|| Mano Mall Joutte Mahaan Batth Bankhan||49||
translation: The tabor and small drum resound and the sound of conches arises. It appears that the wrestlers, holding with their hands the waists of their opponents are trying to throw them down.49.

gurmukhi: ijn sUrn sMgRwm sbl swmuih hÍY mMifE ]
transliteration: Jin Sooran Sanraam Sabal Saamuh(i) Hvai Mandio||
translation: Those warriors who had begun the war confronted their opponents with great strength.

gurmukhi: iqn suBtn qy eyk kwl koaU jIAq n C`ifE ]
transliteration: Tin Soubhatan Te Ek Kaal Ko( i)  Jooat Na Chhaddio||
translation: Out of those warriors the KAL had not left anyone alive.

gurmukhi: sB K`qRI K`g KMf Kyq BU mMfp Awhu`ty ]
transliteration: Sabh Khattroo Khagg Khanndkhet Bhoo Mandap Aahoutte||
translation: All the warriors had gathered in the battlefield holding their swords.

gurmukhi: swr Dwr Dr DUm mukq bMDn qy Cu`ty ]
transliteration: Saar Dhaar Dhar Dhoom Moukat Bandhan Te Chhoutte||
translation: Enduring the somokeless fire of the steel-edge, they have saved themselves from the bondages.

gurmukhi: hÍY tUk tUk ju`Jy sbY pwv n pwCY fwrIAM ]
transliteration: Hvai Took Took Jujjhai Sabai Paav Na Paachhai Ddarooan||
translation: They have all been chopped and fallen as martyrs and none of them hath retraced his steps.

gurmukhi: jYkwr Apwr suDwr huAM bwisv lok isDwrIAM ]50]
transliteration: Jaikaar Apaar Sudhaar Huan Baasiv Lok Sidhdarooan||50||
translation: Those who have gone like this to the abode of Indra, they are hailed with utmost reverence in the world. 50.

gurmukhi: ieh ibiD mcw Gor sMgRwmw ]isDey sUr sUir ky Dwmw ]
transliteration: Ih Bidh(i) Machaa Ghor Sanraamaa|| Sidhae Soor Soor(i) Ke Dhaamaa||
translation: Suchlike horrible war blazed and the brave warriors left for their (heavenly) abode.

gurmukhi: khw lgY vh kQoN lrweI ]Awpn pRBw n brnI jweI ]51]
transliteration: Kahaa Lagad Vah Kathon Laraaoo|| Aapan Prabhaa Na Barnoo Jaaoo||51||
translation: Upto which limit should I describe that war? I cannot describe it with my own understanding.51.

gurmukhi: lvI srb jIqy kusI srb hwry ]bcy jy blI pRwn lY ky isDwry ]
transliteration: Lavoo Sarab Jeete Kousoo Sarab Hdare|| Bache Je Badoo Badoo Praan Lai Ke Sidhdare||
translation: (The descendants of Lava) have all been victorious and the (descendants of Kusha) were all defeated. The descendants of Kusha who remained alive, saved themselves by feeing away.
